gadget.title: Languages
gadget.description: Helps editors to manage multi-lingual content on the website.
gadget.languagesettings: Manage Editable Languages for this Page
gadget.clicktoswitchlanguage: Click to switch to this language branch
gadget.editingforlanguageisdisabled: Editing for this language is disabled
gadget.deletelanguagebranchconfirmation: You are about to delete the page {pageName} in {languageName}.The page including all its versions will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
gadget.autotranslateconfirmation:
You are about to replace content on the page {pageName} in {toLanguage} with an auto-translation from {fromLanguage}.

The content will be overwritten. This action cannot be undone.
gadget.duplicatecontentconfirmation:
You are about to replace content on the page {pageName} in {toLanguage} with {fromLanguage}.

The content will be overwritten. This action cannot be undone.

reverttopublishconfirmation.confirmquestion: Would you like to revert to the published version?
reverttopublishconfirmation.description: All changes that has been made so far in this version will be discarded.

settingview.title: Manage Add-on Settings
settingview.subtitle: Be careful when you change the configuration settings for the EPiServer Languages add-on. The add-on will not work properly if the settings are incorrect.
settingview.name: Name
settingview.subtitle: Be careful when you change the configuration settings for the EPiServer Languages add-on. The add-on will not work properly if the settings are incorrect.
